title: Interaction-Based Learning Design in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience in Using Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: The core involves promoting interaction by linking video content, discussion boards, and learning material distribution in a blended environment.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three elements of the CoI framework (teaching presence, cognitive presence, social presence) to actual learning activities.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans by integrating video content viewing, discussion board participation, and learning material utilization.
Learners can improve knowledge construction skills by over 30% through interaction with peer learners.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
